title: Communist Threat - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/8/19
itunes:title: Communist Threat - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/8/19
description:
Guest host Ian Punnett and an open lines caller discuss whether Russian Communists still threaten the American way of life, and whether the media is being manipulated to spread false messages.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
